trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_SEQ_00<tab>Fuandrec is a breath of fresh air in this house of tears and melancholy─very angry air. She needs you to find someone, and quick.

TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_SEQ_01<tab>Fuandrec's feckless cousin is late for a burial, not the first time he has failed to mark the time. There is naught to do but for you to look for a suitably slipshod person near Halatali.

TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_SEQ_02<tab>Near the ruin of training grounds, you encounter a pair of escaped Coliseum soulkin about to slice a wayfarer to pieces. Rather than wax philosophical, you dispatch the doctores and save Fuandrec's cousin. Report the happy news to her.

TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_SEQ_03<tab>You speak with Fuandrec and tactfully leave out her cousin's mention of her “overtight” corset lacing. However, judging from Fuandrec's own barbs, they are a two of a kind.

TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_FUANDREC_000_000<tab>Where <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> that turnip-head? We have already waited some hours for my cousin, and still he dallies Thal knows where. He is ever late, I do not understand why he cannot simply depart early!

TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_FUANDREC_000_001<tab>Still, I confess, I am fond of the fool. I would go look for him but his route winds close to the Halatali training grounds, and they say 'tis a romp of beasts there─beasts of the most dangerous kind.

TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_FUANDREC_000_002<tab>You <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> an adventurer, and surely this is the sort of thing that, oh, I don't know, makes your blood sing, heart boil, or some such piffle. Will you look for my feckless cousin?

TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_NPC_000_020<tab>Thank you, thank you, and thank you thrice! Saw those rather nasty brutes coming and thought...well, nothing much really beyond “AAARGH!” They really should take old Halatali down─the place has absolutely gone to pot.
TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_NPC_000_021<tab>Oh, look at the time. Mustn't keep the burial waiting too much longer. I s'pose my cousin Fuandrec, she of the overtight corset, is none too pleased.

TEXT_GAIUSB510_00879_FUANDREC_000_030<tab>Oh, thank you! He is absolutely incorrigible, but to think we might have had to bury him as well! Then again, that's one burial he wouldn't have been late for. There's a thought.
